titleStmt.title: A collection of certain letters and conferences lately passed betvvixt certaine preachers & tvvo prisoners in the Fleet
titleStmt.author: Barrow, Henry, 1550?-1593.
Greenwood, John, d. 1593.

notesStmt.note: By Henry Barrow and John Greenwood, whose names appear throughout.
Place of publication conjectured by STC.
Also issued as part 2 Barrow and Greenwood's "A collection of certaine sclaunderous articles".
Item at reel 204:5 identified as STC 5555.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and Folger Shakespeare Library.
